Description: The deep cannot hide its secrets from you.
LevelDescriptionText: 10|The Fierce Philanthropist will help you convert your ship to a zubmarine at her hidden workshop~20|Retrieve zonar schematics from Station III or Khan's Shadow~30|Return the zonar schematics to the hidden workshop in Port Carnelian
ChangeDescriptionText: 10|The Fierce Philanthropist will help you convert your ship to a zubmarine at her hidden workshop.~20|Retrieve zonar schematics from Station III or Khan's Shadow.~30|Return the zonar schematics to the hidden workshop in Port Carnelian.~0|The zubmarine conversion process is complete!
Name: Acquiring a Zubmarine
